front.title: •Hot Pursuit
front.gametext: USED: If opponent's card present with your vehicle of landspeed > 2 has just begun to move as a 'react', cancel that 'react'.  LOST: Select one opponent's vehicle present with your vehicle of landspeed > 2 to be power = 0 for remainder of turn.
front.lore: The mobility of speeder bikes is greatly valued by the Empire's advanced scout detachments.
